    • FlockService

      public FlockService(Repository<Long,Flock> flockRepository, Repository<Long,User> userRepository, ValidatorContext<Flock> validatorFlock)
      Creates an FlockService with the given Repository
      Parameters:
      userRepository - the repository used by the service

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(String... fields)
      Adds a new flock to the repository using the provided fields. Validates the flock data and ensures no duplicate flock names exist.
      Parameters:
      fields - a variable number of strings representing the flock data. The first element is the flock name, and the second element is the flock type.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a flock with the specified name already exists.

    • remove

      public void remove(String id)
      Removes an entity with the specified identifier from the repository. Validates the identifier before proceeding with the removal process. If the identifier is invalid or the entity does not exist, a relevant exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity to be removed
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if the provided identifier is not a valid number
      EntityNotFoundException - if no entity with the specified identifier is found in the repository

    • generateID

      public Long generateID()
      Generates a new unique identifier for a flock entity by finding the maximum existing identifier among all flocks and incrementing it by one.
      Returns:
      a newly generated unique identifier as a Long

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String flockName)
      Checks if a flock with the specified name exists in the repository.
      Parameters:
      flockName - the name of the flock to check for existence
      Returns:
      true if a flock with the given name exists, false otherwise

    • addDuckToFlock

      public void addDuckToFlock(String flockId, String duckId)
      Adds a duck to a specific flock. Validates the identifiers, ensures the existence and compatibility of the flock and duck, and prevents duplication before performing the addition.
      Parameters:
      flockId - the identifier of the flock to which the duck will be added
      duckId - the identifier of the duck to be added to the flock
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if the provided flockId or duckId is not a valid number
      EntityNotFoundException - if the specified flock or duck does not exist, or

    • removeDuckFromFlock

      public void removeDuckFromFlock(String flockId, String duckId)
      Removes a duck from a specified flock. Validates the provided identifiers, ensures the existence of both the flock and the duck, checks type compatibility, and verifies the duckâ€™s presence in the flock before performing the removal.
      Parameters:
      flockId - the identifier of the flock from which the duck will be removed
      duckId - the identifier of the duck to be removed from the flock
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if the provided flockId or duckId is not a valid number
      EntityNotFoundException - if the specified flock or duck does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified duck is not compatible with the flock or is not a part of the flock

    • removeDuckFromAllFlocks

      public void removeDuckFromAllFlocks(String duckId)
      Removes a duck, identified by its unique identifier, from all flocks in the repository. Validates the duck ID before attempting removal. If the ID is invalid or no duck with the specified identifier exists in any flock, an exception is thrown. Saves changes if any removals are made.
      Parameters:
      duckId - the unique identifier of the duck to be removed from all flocks
      Throws:
      IdValidationException - if the provided duckId is not a valid numeric value
